Pricing

Starter websites

₦30,000

Simple blogs, news websites, and personal portfolio sites.

  • 6-10 pages
  • Domain name included*
  • Web hosting included*
  • 3-5 days delivery time

Corporate websites

₦50,000

Corporate websites for businesses, government agencies, NGOs and religious bodies.

  • Unlimited pages
  • Domain name included*
  • Web hosting included*
  • 7-10 days delivery time

Advanced websites

₦80,000

Custom-made online stores, e-commerce websites, forums, membership websites, lead funnels and portals.

  • Unlimited normal pages
  • Up to 30 product pages
  • Payment system integration (USD or NGN)
  • Domain name included*
  • Web hosting included*
  • 14-21 days delivery time

All websites come with the following features

Free logo design

Free SSL integration for security and SEO

Full on-page SEO on all pages

Basic off-page SEO

Custom-made legal pages (privacy policy, terms and conditions pages)

About us page

Google My Business integration for local SEO

Contact form integration

Social media integration

Frequently Asked Questions

Is the website fee one-time only?

No. Starter and Corporate websites have a recurring yearly fee of ₦5,000 while Advanced websites have a recurring yearly fee of ₦10,000. These fees cover yearly web hosting and domain name renewal, support and other site maintenance.

What happens If I don't pay my yearly renewal fees?

Why would you want to do that, biko? All websites who default in payments are given a 2 months grace period, during which numerous reminders will be sent. Continual refusal to pay the renewal fees will result in the termination of our web hosting, support and site maintenance services for that website.

What domain extensions are included in the website package?

The pricing stated above only covers .com.ng, .org.ng, .com, .org and .net domain names. You may have to make additional payments for more expensive domains like the .ng, .africa, .tv domain names and the likes.

Where will my website be hosted?

We currently host all our clients website on Interserver, a US based web hosting with 99.9% uptime guarantee, unlimited traffic allowance (bandwidth), fast LiteSpeed servers, guaranteed email delivery, Intershield security, daily backups and 19 years experience in web hosting.

How much web hosting disk space will I get?

Starter websites get 3gb disk space, Corporate websites get 5gb disk space while Advanced websites get 10gb disk space. This can be increased as your demands increase.

What If I already have my domain name and web hosting?

No problem, we can build your website on your previously owned domain name and web hosting. However, note that this does not reduce the pricing fee as outlined above.

What payment methods do you accept? Can I pay in installments?

After you make an order an invoice will be sent to you via email. Then you can pay with with credit/debit cards, USSD or bank transfer. All payments are processed securely with our partners, Paystack. We are the choice web design agency for startups because of our flexible payment plans. Payment can be made in two installments: 50% before commencement, and the remaining 50% after the website is fully ready.

Will I be able to make changes to the website myself?

At Digital Yeast, we use modern and easy technologies to build our clients websites. Hence you’ll be able to learn how to make minor changes such as adding new or editing old blog posts. However, major updates and overhauls will be done by us, and may attract extra fees. Read all other terms and conditions here.

Digital Yeast is a leading web design and startup branding agency in Nigeria. We help young Nigerian brands establish powerful online presence with beautifully-crafted, fast-loading, ultramodern and responsive websites that gets noticed.
